original_text: Even of the children of Israel's half, Moses took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them unto the Levites, which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord; as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 그 절반에서 모세가 사람이나 짐승의 오십분의 일을 취하여 여호와의 장막을 맡은 레위인에게 주었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: Even of the children of Israel's half
Moses took one portion of fifty
both of man and of beast
and gave them unto the Levites
which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord
